hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
source /home/test/.bashrc # Install dependencies sudo yum install -y git tar wget java-1.8.0-openjdk-devel patch which subversion-devel #subversion-devel is the dependency of mesos
# Set environment variables export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0 export PATH=/usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0/bin:$PATH export SBT_OPTS="-Xmx4g"
# Install sbt wget https://dl.bintray.com/sbt/native-packages/sbt/0.13.11/sbt-0.13.11.tgz tar -zxvf sbt-0.13.11.tgz export PWD=`pwd` export PATH=$PWD/sbt/bin:$PATH export SBT_OPTS="-Xmx4g"
export MOUNT_DIR=/home/test/work/Mesos_for_Marathon/RHEL7.3/IBM ls $MOUNT_DIR #Copy all the required binaries. sudo cp $MOUNT_DIR/libmesos-1.2.0.so /usr/local/lib/ sudo cp $MOUNT_DIR/libmesos.la /usr/local/lib/ sudo cp $MOUNT_DIR/libmesos.so /usr/local/lib/ sudo cp -r $MOUNT_DIR/mesos /usr/local/lib/
# Build Marathon git clone https://github.com/mesosphere/marathon.git cd marathon git checkout v1.4.5 sbt assembly sed -i "s/shasum/sha1sum/" ./bin/build-distribution ./bin/build-distribution cd ../
# Start Zookeper service git clone https://github.com/apache/mesos cd mesos/ git checkout 1.2.0 cd 3rdparty/ tar zxf zookeeper-3.4.8.tar.gz ls cd zookeeper-3.4.8 sudo cp conf/zoo_sample.cfg conf/zoo.cfg sudo env PATH=$PATH ./bin/zkServer.sh start sleep 20 cd ../../../
# Start Marathon service cd marathon sudo env PATH=$PATH nohup ./bin/start --master local --zk zk://127.0.0.1:2181/marathon & sleep 100 wget http://127.0.0.1:8080
sleep 60s ps -aef
pgrep -d" " -f "marathon" | sudo xargs kill;
sleep 20s ps -aef
